title: Adopt ‘Make Yourself Unique’ as the official Million Token slogan and integrate this into the marketing channels
body:
‘There are billions of humans all over the planet and in order to succeed, you have to differentiate yourself and offer a portfolio of skills which make you stand out from the competition. This is the core philosophy of Million Token: MM is already blockchain agnostic, has started its own launchpad and is one of the frontrunners in the NFT space. These are things that other cryptocurrencies cannot do. Million Token continues to make itself unique. This is what will drive its success.’ 

^ This could be a strong, emotional message for the project for the following reasons: 


- Make yourself unique is a genuine lifestyle message rather than ‘get rich quick’ / ‘buy a lambo’ / ‘become a millionaire’ etc which have a less credible and slightly scammy undertone. 


- It is in line with the message from the TL videos over the last years (pre-MM): about developing skills and succeeding. This may bridge a gap and encourage some of the other TL followers to take a fresh look at MM? 


- It will help build the MM brand by providing a life philosophy for people to identify with. The concept can become more of a frame of mind and represent a life goal. 


- The slogan would tie in with similar tags already used like ‘one in a million’ also promoting scarcity / uniqueness. 


- In short: Million Token can help YOU become more unique, learn about crypto / defi and improve your skill set (and of course become a millionaire in the process) 

ALL COMMENTS WELCOME!
author: 0x50C9aDD63C1a22067Fe86c347996117F402F6633
